summary: WHEN COMING TO A STOP YOU HEAR A SQUEALING SOUND COMING FROM THE RIGHT PASSENGER SIDE TIRE, THEY SAY ITS NOT AN ISSUE BUT JUST A NUISANCE NOISE,, BUT AS IT KEEPS GETTING WORSE THE BRAKE IS NOW NOT RELEASING WHEN WE TRY AND GO AFTER COMING TO A STOP. WE HAVE ALSO NOTICES IT DOES THIS ALOT MORE ON HOTTER DAYS THAN IT DOES ON A COOLER DAY, I KNOW WE ARE NOT THE ONLY ONE WITH THIS PROBLEM, I HAVE FOUND COMPLAINTS ABOUT THE SAME PROBLEMS ON THESES SITES HTTP://WWW.CRUZETALK.COM/FORUM/34-1-4L-TURBO/6326-BRAKE-CATCHING-SOUND.HTML AND THIS ONE FROM CHEVY HTTP://WWW.CHEVROLETCRUZEFORUM.COM/INDEX.PHP?/TOPIC/1900-NOISE-FROM-SUSPENSION-WHEN-BRAKING/ PLEASE LOOK INTO THIS PROBLEM BEFORE MORE PEOPLE END UP GETTING HURT OR INJURED.  *TR
